dct_title_s: A chart of the northern part of the Bay of Bengal : between Point Palmiras and the Aracan shore
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:880,000 (E 85째50'00"--E 93째15'00"/N 23째30'00"--N 19째10'00"). Depth shown by soundings. Inset: Chittigong River. Includes table: Astronomical Observations. Includes 4 coastal profiles.
